abstract_ssm: The William Hubbell scrapbook and photographs spans the period 1895 to 1902 and contains discharge papers, membership papers/certificate regarding the Military Order of Foreign Wars, promotion notices, newspaper articles, letters, and funeral notices of William Henry Hubbell and other members of the New York State National Guard, 47th Regiment, as well as related photographs.  William Henry Hubbell (1847-1902) was born in New York City and moved to Greenpoint in 1857. The scrapbook and photographs in this collection primarily document the 47th Regiment's occupation of Puerto Rico after the Spanish-American War.
